The paragraph is about measuring FPD (Fetal Bovine Serum Platelet Derivative) after drug exposure for hiPS-CMs (human induced Pluripotent Stem Cell-derived Cardiomyocytes) on MEA (Microelectrode Array) and FPD measurement was done for monitoring the drug effect on the cardiomyocytes, not for diagnosing or treating a disease.

Note: In the original paragraph, "hiPS-CMs were seeded onto MEA" implies that hiPS-CMs are not a chemical entity, but rather a type of cells. "For 2min every 10min for 30min after drug exposure" suggests that "drug" is a chemical entity. "MEA" is a device used for measuring biological activity and is not a chemical entity.
